page.title: 16HOUSING
page.content: ARE DESIRABLE BECAUSE OF THEIR {EXCELLENT CONSTRUCTION.}THEY ARE EASILY RECOGNISABLE IN THE LOCALITY. MOST OF THE BUILDING IN THIS AREA WAS BUILT AT THE START OF THE CENTURY.THIS AREA HAS A VERY HIGH DENSITY OF {PRIVATE UNFURNISHED HOUSING STOCK. {PRIVATE RENTED ACCOMODATION}IN THIS AREA IS PREDOMINANTLY WARNER'S PROPERTY:TWO STOREY PURPOSE BUILT FLATS(CURRENTLY PAINTED DARK GREEN). IN CERTAIN PARTS OF THIS AREA e.g. AT THE JUNCTION OF HIGH ST. AND HOE ST. WARNERS' AND OTHER PRIVATE ACCOMMODATION ACCOUNT FOR 75% OF ALL HOUSING STOCK.THERE IS THUS VERY {LITTLE COUNCIL ACCOMMODATION.}THESE PATCHES ARE PREDOMINANTLY AROUND ERSKINE ROAD AND ESSEX CLOSE, THE LATTER AGAIN HAVING A PARTICULARLY HIGH CONCENTRATION OF ELDERLY TENANTS.
